room_title: Escape room "Word Mania Extreme" by The Room Upstairs in Chicago
room_description: This game is a life size word search and general age-appropriate trivia challenge. Team work is essential! Devise a strategy with your teammates to divide and conquer the room! This game is a fast-paced, heart-pounding, adrenaline-pumping, down-to-the-wire battle. Answer the trivia questions, find the words in the room, and be prepared to complete additional tasks in order to emerge victorious from the room before time runs out! Word Mania has thrown down the gauntlet! How will you respond?
